title: First Look: The Ritchey Garden City is the Track Bike You Didn’t Know You Wanted
content:
The Ritchey Garden City is the fixie that will make you want to take up track cycling, or grow a moustache; one of the two. It's a limited edition affair, with only 100 numbered frames to be made.

Read the full article at First Look: The Ritchey Garden City is the Track Bike You Didn’t Know You Wanted on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
